intent_atoms.description: Provide a comprehensive README feature matrix that lists supported boxes, platforms, file types, and key MP4 box families for ISOInspectorKit, ISOInspectorApp, and the CLI.
The README must include a feature matrix summarizing ISOInspectorKit, ISOInspectorApp, and the CLI using DocC manuals and kit exports.
Supported platforms, file types, and key MP4 box families must be documented by linking to the Swift enums that power traversal heuristics.
A DocC-aligned SVG concept capture depicting the tree/detail/hex workflow must be added to the README until production screenshots are available.
The README feature matrix and documentation must remain consistent with the canonical references in DocC manuals and kit exports.
Use DocC manuals and ISOInspectorKit exports as the canonical source for the feature matrix to ensure consistency across documentation.

functional_units.name: README Feature Matrix
functional_units.description: Provides a summary of supported boxes, platforms, and screenshots in the README

functional_units.name: ISOInspectorKit API Documentation
functional_units.description: DocC manuals and kit exports summarising ISOInspectorKit capabilities

functional_units.name: ISOInspectorApp Overview
functional_units.description: DocC-aligned SVG depicting tree/detail/hex workflow for the app

functional_units.name: CLI Feature Matrix
functional_units.description: Summarises CLI features alongside ISOInspectorKit and ISOInspectorApp in README

functional_units.name: Supported Platforms Listing
functional_units.description: Documents which platforms are supported by the system

functional_units.name: Supported File Types Listing
functional_units.description: Lists file types that the system can handle

functional_units.name: MP4 Box Families Documentation
functional_units.description: Links to Swift enums powering traversal heuristics for MP4 box families

functional_units.name: FourCharContainerCode Enum
functional_units.description: Swift enum defining four-character container codes used in ISO traversal

functional_units.name: MediaAndIndexBoxCode Enum
functional_units.description: Swift enum defining media and index box codes used in ISO traversal

functional_units.name: Markdown Normalization Script
functional_units.description: Python script that normalises Markdown spacing and wrapping for notes
